thread.title: Obama announces education commitments for Latino students
thread.title_full: Obama announces education commitments for Latino students

title: Obama announces education commitments for Latino students
text:
> Top News Obama announces education commitments for Latino students President Barack Obama, left, standing with Vice President Joe Biden, right, speaks at a reception in the East Room of the White House in Washington, Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, for Hispanic Heritage Month and the 25th anniversary of the White House Initiative on Educational Excellence for Hispanics. (AP Photo/Susan Walsh) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
